title: Search for the Sun
description: The interwoven lives of Jack, Brandi, Margarita, Father McGrath, and Mr. Avery Devereaux. Comas, affairs, the undead, and last wills and testaments! Filthy. But genuinely arousing.
quote: Jack, I think the baby might be yours.
altHero: Jack holds a drink while Margarita unzips her dress
alt1: Margarita, surprised, holds her dress up to cover her body while Jack stands nearby
alt2: Father McGrath looks disheveled and fanatical
alt3: Mr. Avery Devereaux grabs Margarita in the workplace
alt4: Brandi sits on a desk in a meeting with two men
